mapper.insert: insert into spring_board(num, name, email, pwd, subject, content, regdate, hit, parent, sort, tab) values( (select NVL(max(num),0)+1 from spring_board), #{name}, #{email},#{pwd},#{subject},#{content},SYSDATE,0, (select NVL(max(num),0)+1 from spring_board),0,0)
